alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 12:50PM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
